about_the_game:
You wake up and find out youself in a strange world, there's nothing but a suspicous portal, you have no choice but step in.
Everything here doesn't seem quite friendly to you, somehow, the only instinct left in your mind shouts out:
survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive! survive ! survive ! survive!
I want to survive !!!

Features
  • Top-down arcade shooter
  • Pixel graphic
  • Auto fire
  • roguelike deck builder
  • Multiple Charactors to select from (not in the current demo)
  • more than 50+ upgrades to choose from (more in the complete version)
  • Collect coins to buy upgrade ( cards)
  • Survive 15 ~ 60 seconds each floor
  • DO nOT diE

  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: 3.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! I don't want to die
